channel.title: Pierre Oscar Levy on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Pierre Oscar Levy on Strat

item.title: Sandcastle
item.description: Sandcastle is the french comic book that the recent M. Night Shyamalan’s movie Old was based on. A bunch of different people arrive for a relaxing day at the beach and find themselves aging extremely rapidly, babies become teens and older folk die. Hijinks ensue. I don’t get it.
